description: Greetings! And thank you for choosing this course. After only 75 minutes of detailed, step-by-step video lessons, you will be able to rapidly create websites and web pages for your business, for your friend's business, or for your resume or portfolio. You could even start up your own web design business! This is a great place to start for people who are interested in the web design/development industries, or for people who want to save money and learn a new skill by building their website themselves. HTML is a computer language that is very easy to learn and understand, even people with no programming or computer science skills can pick it up and use it to build sites. I'm looking forward to seeing you in the course!
title: Make and Deploy HTML5 Websites - Super Fast!
